Weather Wisdom Blog

Snow to dust area Sunday

Just under one inch to as much as 3 inches of snow will fall statewide with that higher amount over Cape Cod, meteorologist David Epstein writes. (Boston.com)

Twitter: Hackers attack 250,000 accounts

Twitter discovered that access to usernames, e-mail addresses, and passwords may have been compromised for 250,000 of its more than 200 million users. (AP)

Business

Dow closes over 14,000 for first time since Oct. 2007

Propelled by strong auto sales and optimism about U.S. jobs, the Dow Jones industrial average crossed the line early Friday and continued flirting with the mark all day. The other major stock indexes also rose.
